SectionBody.Text: All returns shall be filed according to the following schedule:

Subsection.Text: Real propertywhen required by specific provision of general law.
Railroad, railroad terminal, private car and freight line and equipment company propertyApril 1.
All other returns and applications not otherwise specified by specific provision of general lawApril 1.

Note.Text: Consolidation of provisions of former ss. 193.203, 193.211.
